Title: Veer-Zaara
Writer: Aditya Chopra (dialogue), Aditya Chopra (screenplay), Aditya Chopra (story)
Actors: Shah Rukh Khan, Preity Zinta, Rani Mukerji, Kirron Kher
Plot: Veer-Zaara is a saga of love, separation, courage and sacrifice. A love story that is an inspiration and will remain a legend forever.
